title: Finland
summary: Citi has had a presence in Finland since 1977. Our business is focused on Finnish-based multinational companies, financial institutions, the public sector as well as providing services to subsidiaries of foreign multinational companies operating in Finland. For these companies, we are among their most important banks, and we work with them across the globe, making full use of our international network.
tag-2: Citi provides a full range of global financial services to Finnish clients
